messages.message: @Heymian Is there a resource that you could recommend work with Daniel today?  Given it a holiday in India, and a US holiday on Monday, I'd really like to get this addressed before end of day today.  We have a workshop with the Arch team on Wednesday where they will get their first hands-on impression of Instabase, and we need to make sure it goes smooth.

@alagar is an absolute hero, and has logged in at 10:15 in India on a holiday to help us.  :pray:

I'll keep everyone updated if he is able to find the resolution.

Hey, sure things. if you post this to <#C01N7DV1137|> you’ll get eyes from the infra on-call folks there. What storage system are they using, this sounds like they didn’t configure the permissions on their storage system correctly.
oh, and a Zendesk ticket will immediately get the eyes of the support team and they also have an on-call system in place.

Incase you need it for tracking anything, I've added a ticket here: https://instabase.zendesk.com/agent/tickets/2640

Let me know if I should be filling this out differently!
cool thanks! just saw the dup thread on the core service channel. looks like nidhi’s remembered fix!
Thanks so much for taking a look :pray:
